definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale

sentences.english: The instrument improved efficiency of inhaling oxygen, reduced infection and droped the amount of oxygen consumption down.
sentences.chinese: 增加吸氧效果，减少感染，大大地降低氧损耗量。

sentences.english: The mechanism of oxygen absorption and deoxygenation is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了该配合物的吸氧与释氧机理。

sentences.english: Many of their players need bottled oxygen to alleviate the effects of altitude.
sentences.chinese: 他们的许多球手都需要吸氧来减弱高原反应。

sentences.english: No thirst, cut zone little pain, monitoring oxygen in.
sentences.chinese: 无口渴，切口区略疼痛，监测吸氧中。

sentences.english: The left and right cardiac function of 11 patients with chronic mountain sickness was studied before and after oxygen administration.
sentences.chinese: 本文探讨慢性高山病人吸氧前后左和右心室功能变化。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the time length of sufficient oxygenation in arterial blood after increasing concentration of oxygen inhalation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨提高吸氧浓度后动脉血达到充分氧合的时间。

sentences.english: He suffers since a rare tom of muscular dystrophy, a ventilator supplying his oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 他患有一种罕见的肌失养症，靠吸氧器供氧。

sentences.english: If breathing is difficult give oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 对呼吸困难者给予吸氧。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the effects of oxygen therapy and local pressurization in alleviating plateau hypoxia at high altitude.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价吸氧和局部增压对高原缺氧的治疗效果。

sentences.english: Passengers who have severe altitude illness should ask for an oxygen mask.
sentences.chinese: 高原反应比较严重的旅客也可以使用吸氧面罩。

definition: intravenous infusion/to get put on an IV
hyperbaric oxygen/hyperbaric oxygenation/also abbr. for 高壓氧治療|高压氧治疗[gao1 ya1 yang3 zhi4 liao2], hyperbaric therapy
to have one stomach's pumped/gastric lavage (medicine)
hyperbaric medicine/hyperbaric oxygen therapy (HBOT)/also 高壓氧療法|高压氧疗法[gao1 ya1 yang3 liao2 fa3]
to put sb on an intravenous drip
ventilator (artificial breathing apparatus used in hospitals)
to drip into/to transfuse/to percolate/to drip feed/fig. to instill
